content: hey friends and fellow crafters I want
to show you this craft I got by Frank Roberts and he did a whole adventure
craft for me it's called the cult of the emerald web and very cool so this druid
finds us masks and he ends up serving this evil entity called rascally as' and
it's his giant spider thing and he seeks the eyes of the innocent to bring forth
his master into this plane so very cool got some cool scatter terrain it's this
evil spider theme and let me show you what that looks like all right so here
we go here's our first setup and these are egg nests right and very cool i
really like the emerald gems there that are popping out of the ground and the
nice wispy eggs which were inspired by Jeremy's black magic craft webs and look
at that here's some smaller spiders and I really like the emerald coloring very
cool and then it gets worse and then we have giant spiders same kind of webbing
on the on the base and the emeralds popping out I really think that's cool
really neat and here we go nice pretty freakin scary now let's take this 211
with the druid and he did the druid that wears the mask very cool there's a
little altar on there with a bloody cup I assume where he sacrifices the eyes so
to this evil entity so I'm very cool and got a bunch of eggs there so yeah so
nice and he actually put a light in there so it's a tea light that flickers
in the Emerald bunch there so very cool just super neat and here let's go to the
piece de resistance we got this giant spider look at this thing this thing is
crazy crazy cool I love the emeralds like jutting out of it so neat so it's
like infected I imagine it's like infected the cave where this thing
exists right and all those animals will pop
you know in the cave it also has a light inside of it and you can't see it very
well here on the you know flood lighted example but and when it's darker you
can't see the light flickering through the emerald so very cool very creepy and
just what a great craft thank you Frank I really appreciate it
